Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: அடக்கம் அமரருள் உய்க்கும் அடங்காமைஆரிருள் உய்த்து விடும்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Self-control will place (a man) among the Gods; the want of it will drive (him) into the thickest darkness (of hell).

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A central figure stands at a fork in their life path.
Layered_Composition.Midground: On the right, they practice self-control ('அடக்கம்'), visualized as them calmly mastering their five senses (represented by five glowing, tamed beasts). This path ascends as a stairway of light towards the realm of the Gods ('அமரருள்').
Layered_Composition.Background: On the left, they give in to a lack of control ('அடங்காமை'), visualized as them being dragged along by the same five beasts, now wild and chaotic. This path descends steeply into a terrifying, pitch-black abyss of utter darkness ('ஆர் இருள்').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A stark choice and its absolute consequences: self-control leads to divinity, while its absence leads to the deepest darkness.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The path of light ascending to the heavens versus the path of darkness descending into the abyss is a powerful, clear metaphor. The state of the five sensory beasts (tamed vs. wild) visually explains the internal state that leads to each destiny.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Ascendant vs. descendant, divine vs. damned, controlled vs. chaotic.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The right path is bathed in a brilliant, divine, golden-white light. The left path is consumed by an absolute, terrifying blackness, a true void from which no light escapes.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A wide, epic shot that captures the central figure, the choice, and the two vastly different, ultimate destinations.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with strong ethereal effects for the divine realm and terrifying darkness effects for the abyss.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Extreme high-contrast lighting to represent the absolute choice between divinity and damnation.

Flux_Optimized_Prompt.Negative_Prompt: middle path, grey destinies, text artifacts, cartoonish beasts.
